ModMetaData.name: RimFantasy - Temperature Regulation
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mod Version: v1.0[/h1]
This mod adds 4 new magical gem furnitures that radiate temperature changing energy.
Moderately powerful but costly, they are capable of supporting anywhere from a small storage room to a large facility when multiple are installed. Be careful though, the energies within the crystals are barely contained and excessive damage will produce a rather spectacular explosion.
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [*]2 Crystal Bowls (Cold/Hot) [*]2 Pylons (Frost/Flame) [*]1 Research [/list]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2630669656]RimFantasy - Gemstones[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Crystallic Lighting[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Arcane Batons[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Arcane Weapons[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1916352291]RimTraits - Medieval Talent[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2206957172]RimTraits - General Traits[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244594116]RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colors[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595980371]Milkshakes - Digital Deluxe Edition[/url] [/list]
[b]Mod Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*]Save Game Compatible [*]Will not play nice with other gemstone mods without a patch. [/list]
[b]Balance:[/b] Gems are intentionally sparse and not easy to obtain through natural means, but they can also be purchased from traders or obtained from salvaging certain objects.
Balance feedbacks are welcomed, please provide context when doing so.
